item.title: Immigration Can Help Solve the Nursing Shortage
item.description: The nursing shortage is a serious problem that is affecting the quality of care for patients. The United States is aging, and the number of people over the age of 65 is expected to grow significantly in the coming years. This will increase the demand for nursing services.
